title: Massacre in Celebration
description:
A loving father and husband is accused of killing his wife, 

three children, and the family dog at their home in Celebration, Florida and living with their rotting bodies for weeks. What could have triggered the massacre in the “Happiest Place On Earth.”

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
